CONSTITUTION OF THE SAMPLE TRIBAL NATION

PREAMBLE
We, the people of the Sample Tribal Nation, establish this Constitution.

ARTICLE I - NAME AND TERRITORY
Section 1. Name
The name of this organization shall be the Sample Tribal Nation.

Section 2. Territory
The territory shall include all lands within the reservation boundaries.

ARTICLE II - MEMBERSHIP
Section 1. Eligibility
All persons of Sample descent are eligible for membership.

Section 2. Requirements
Membership requires documentation of lineage.

ARTICLE III - GOVERNING BODY
Section 1. Tribal Council
The governing body shall be the Tribal Council.

Section 2. Composition
The Council shall consist of seven elected members.
